00044 class StochasticWntCellCycleModel : public WntCellCycleModel
00045 {
00046 private:
00047 
00049     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00056     template<class Archive>
00057     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00058     {
00059         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<WntCellCycleModel>(*this);
00060 
00061         // Make sure the random number generator is also archived
00062         SerializableSingleton<RandomNumberGenerator>* p_rng_wrapper = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance()->GetSerializationWrapper();
00063         archive & p_rng_wrapper;
00064 
00065         archive & mStochasticG2Duration;
00066     }
00067 
00069     double mStochasticG2Duration;
00070 
00080     void GenerateStochasticG2Duration();
00081 
00082 public:
00083 
00089     StochasticWntCellCycleModel(boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellCycleModelOdeSolver> pOdeSolver = boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellCycleModelOdeSolver>());
00090 
00095     AbstractCellCycleModel* CreateCellCycleModel();
00096 
00100     void InitialiseDaughterCell();
00101 
00109     void Initialise();
00110 
00115     void ResetForDivision();
00116 
00120     double GetG2Duration();
00121 
00127     virtual void OutputCellCycleModelParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00128 };
